desir path said final cours and there need keep thi quiet the cut interest rate also line with the chang econom situat the last few month all all the bundesbank way abandon money suppli polici with orient would also mean the end strict stabil polici becaus both interest rate and liquid would affect requir currenc intervent and could longer steer autonom the bundesbank even interest rate are not the centr the bundesbank consider but reflect competit and other market condit mueller said cut bank liquid will not directli influenc central bank money stock the bundesbank main money suppli indic thi doe not reflect bank liquid but the liquid industri and household which can not directli reach with the bundesbank instrument mueller said the less depend non-bank are bank credit the harder steer interest rate would have been appropri credit grow excess would not onli have miss target but probabl even set off further inflow said mueller said growth money suppli still too high the last three month money stock grew annual rate seven pct down from pct the previou quarter the growth curv therefor come closer the three six pct target corridor for central bank money stock growth point the
